details.title: Reconstruction of chaotic systems using chaotic synchronization
details.abstract: A method based on the concept of the chaotic synchronization is presented to reconstruct a chaotic system if the structure of the system and the previous time history of a single variable are known. The reconstruction of the Lorenz system is studied and it is found that one specific parameter of the Lorenz system can be quickly obtained by a simple formula if the other two parameters are already known.
